TCM 31 Days of Oscar 2012

Oscar-awarded movies are aired for 31 days on Turner Classic Movies. 2012's theme was various global spots that movies were set or filmed in. The site garnered many awards, the most outstanding being the Best of Interactive at the 2012 Philly Ad Club Addy Awards.

Done while working at 1 Trick Pony.
